CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The new polymer PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) was synthesized by coupling 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2 , 5dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione and 2,6-di(trimethyl- tin)-N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole via a Stille reaction ( Scheme 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

Here are the Material Name entities in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP |
| DTDPP(Bu) |
| 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione |
| 2,6-di(trimethyl-tin)-N-[1-(2-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b:2',3'-d]pyrrole |

Note: The parentheses and brackets in the Material Names are part of the names themselves, and are not added by me for clarity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid Material Name entities in the given paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP |
| DTDPP(Bu) |

The other two entities, "3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione" and "2,6-di(trimethyl-tin)-N-[1-(2-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b:2',3'-d]pyrrole", are not clearly referring to material names, but rather to specific compounds or chemical structures. Therefore, they are not included in the list of valid Material Name entities.
